hero.subtitle1: Selvage is an AI code review CLI tool.
hero.subtitle2: Get instant feedback without waiting for reviews.
hero.subtitle4: AI analyzes your code changes to improve quality and prevent bugs.

demo.subtitle: Analyze code changes and receive quality improvement suggestions with a simple command

features.subtitle: Cutting-edge AI technology meets developer-friendly workflows to deliver a completely new code review experience

aiModels.title: Multiple AI Model Support
aiModels.description: Leverage latest LLM models including OpenAI GPT-5, Anthropic Claude Sonnet-4, Google Gemini

gitWorkflow.title: Git Workflow Integration
gitWorkflow.description: Supports analysis of staged, unstaged, and specific commit/branch changes

codeReview.title: Comprehensive Code Review
codeReview.description: Detects bugs and logic errors, suggests code quality and readability improvements

smartContext.title: Smart Context
smartContext.description: Provides optimized context based on Tree-sitter AST analysis

largeContext.title: Large Context Review
largeContext.description: Stable large-scale code review support even when exceeding model context limits

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.description: Free to use and modify under Apache-2.0 license

smartContext.introMiddle: to precisely extract only the code blocks related to changed lines,
smartContext.introBold2: ensuring both cost efficiency and review quality

preciseExtraction.title: Precise Extraction
preciseExtraction.description: Extracts only the minimal function/class blocks containing changed lines and related dependencies (e.g., import statements)

costOptimization.title: Cost Optimization
costOptimization.description: Significantly reduces token usage by sending only necessary context instead of entire files

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Maintains high review accuracy through AST-based precise code structure understanding

autoApplication.title: Smart Context Auto Application
autoApplication.descriptionPrefix: Selvage analyzes file size and change scope to
autoApplication.descriptionBold: automatically select the most efficient review method

smallChanges.title: Small Changes
smallChanges.description: Fast and accurate analysis with Smart Context

smallFiles.title: Small Files
smallFiles.description: Complete context understanding through full file analysis

largeFilesPartial.title: Partial Changes in Large Files
largeFilesPartial.description: Focused analysis of related code only with Smart Context

largeFilesLarge.title: Large Changes in Large Files
largeFilesLarge.description: Comprehensive review through full file analysis

autoApplication.autoOptimizationSuffix: : The optimal analysis method for each situation is automatically applied without additional configuration.

languageSupport.generalContextSubtitle: Supports general context extraction for major programming languages

aiModels.subtitle: Easily use various cutting-edge AI models with a single API key through OpenRouter integration

openRouterInfo.title: Manage all models below with one OpenRouter API key!
openRouterInfo.description: Access all AI models with a single API key through OpenRouter. Individual Provider API keys are also supported.

models.claudeSonnet4: Hybrid reasoning model optimized for advanced coding (200K context)
models.gemini25Pro: Large context and advanced reasoning (1M+ tokens)
models.gemini25Flash: Optimized for response speed and cost efficiency (1M+ tokens)
models.kimiK2: 1T parameter MoE large-scale reasoning model (128K tokens)

quickStart.subtitle: Start AI-powered code reviews in minutes without complex setup

recommendedMethod.title: Recommended Method (using uv)
recommendedMethod.note: uv only needs to be installed once

traditionalMethod.title: Traditional Method (pip)
traditionalMethod.note: ⚠️ May encounter externally-managed-environment error in some environments

options.targetCommit: Review changes from specific commit to HEAD (e.g., abc1234)
options.targetBranch: Review changes between current branch and specified branch (e.g., main)
options.openUi: Automatically launch UI after review completion
options.noPrint: Do not output review results to terminal (terminal output enabled by default)
options.skipCache: Perform new review without using cache

examples.fastModel: Review simple changes with fast and economical model
examples.webUi: Detailed review check with web UI after review

results.title: Checking Results
results.additionalInfoPrefix: You can use the web UI for

examples.webUiManagement: Manage all saved review results with web UI

footer.starMessage: If you like this project, please give us a star!
